name: places/ChIJm3ByW3NZwokR5xTGfoAwCvA
formattedAddress: 528 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 528 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: I parked at this garage through SpotHero for a week and paid $207. I parked my car after the beginning of my reservation at 3 PM and I left a day early. When I went to get my car they refused to give it to me without paying an additional $114 which they claimed was due to my leaving the reservation early. The manager, Meer, said that if I wanted a refund on this additional payment, I would need to contact SpotHero, even though the garage is the one who charged me. They could not offer an explanation as to why I was being charged an additional amount for leaving early. This was a really negative experience, as I was forced to pay extra money (more than half what I had already paid) in order to get my car back. Now I am having difficulty with SpotHero getting a refund and there is no phone number to call the garage for help with the situation.  Don’t park here!

originalText.text: I don’t usually leave reviews but the worker at this place really irked me. I was circling looking for parking since 545 am around the blocks of the garage and had a spot reserve just incase for 615 due to I have a 630 appointment in Manhattan. The gates were locked at 6 am and the multiple times I was circling. When it came close to my time and I still couldn’t find street parking, I was going to use my 615 reserved spot, issue was at 615 the gates were still down and locked. At 625 they were finally up and the worker was extremely rude before I even started talking and I was the first car in im told I need to wait, that he doesn’t need this in the morning etc etc and that he came from queens. I live and commuted from queens also, that’s not an excuse. If the garage is suppose to be open at 6 am you need to be there before your start time. I get stuff happens but this was almost 30 minutes after your suppose to be open and you are giving me extreme attitude when I didn’t even get nasty. I get at times too there are wait times, it’s Manhattan but don’t especially give me the line “I need to get my work pants on” etc etc and you are going extremely slow. Your dealing with people , and your extremely extremely late, that is your fault not mine. All my jobs I’ve had you can’t be late that’s why you leave early and give cushion time. It’s common sense it’s not raining it’s not snowing. Don’t be extremely rude when your in the wrong.

originalText.text: Don’t park here. I provided notice of a termination on 11/20/20, to cancel the month of December 2020. My contract states that termination occurs “Commencing the following month”. They want me to pay for December 2020, when I already sold my car, didn’t park there once, saying there is 30 day cancelation policy when it is not written in the original contract.

originalText.text: Prepaid for parking, and was charged again upon pickup. When I brought it to their attention, they refused to pay me back because they “don’t do refunds”. These people are thieves and took nearly $500 for 5 days of parking. Do not park here.

originalText.text:
Laz double charged me for a recent parking stay.

There was terrible customer service and the attendents were rude. I have spent many hours on the phone trying to get a refund, with no luck.

I recommend parking elsewhere.
